channel.title: MySql Database?
channel.description: Is it possible to run a server through a MySql data-base or even just a website? Please post here. Any help is greatly appreciated..

item.title: MySql Database?
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

if you have full access to your server. yes you can do it.

Read full topic

item.title: MySql Database?
item.dc:creator: @laurens800 laurens800
item.description:
@laurens800 wrote:

probally but then it would get hosted by your website provider
and thats useless because you cant open ports -.-

Read full topic

item.title: MySql Database?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“craids, post:4, topic:67385”][quote author=NewbieNewty link=topic=98450.msg1010501#msg1010501 date=1173847524]

yes you need to remake your server
whitescape is sql based
but i thought they will remake it to a emulator again

So could I run it through a website, like upload a JAR and run it from there?

[/quote]
You need the client.You can get the client that would connect to your server and make a webclient.[/quote]

Not A Webclient… I mean like a Web Server… Like run it on the Internet…

Read full topic
